channel.title: Exhibitions on DKO en AR - demosite en playground for AR en art exhibitions
channel.description: Recent content in Exhibitions on DKO en AR - demosite en playground for AR en art exhibitions

item.title: 3D sculptures - markers + annotation
item.description: A sample of 3D rendered sculptures, varying in size. Simple demo to display the proof of concept.

item.title: 3D sculptures - markers for various sizes
item.description: A sample of 3D rendered sculptures, varying in size. Simple demo to display the proof of concept.

item.title: Geolocatie
item.description: Sandbox to use geolocation as menu for navigating exhibition website instead of classic mobile menu. Possibly using leaflet.js to enhance features. Goal is nft emulation.

item.title: Schilderijen - extra content (video, text, links...) & Annotations
item.description: Proof of concept of paintings, using 2D images rendered in 3D environment, with annotations.

item.title: Schilderijen - met extra content (video, text, links...) en black box effect
item.description: Proof of concept using sky and black box in combination with AR.
